title: Settings
notifications_description: When an action happens in any of the organizations or apps that you are a member of you will be notified. You can manage your personal notification settings and turn on/off notifications on specific platform entities.
name: Name
your_user_id_description: This is your user id within your Agnost Cluster.
your_name_description: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
your_email_description: This is your visible email within the platform. You can also use your email when signing in to the platform.
your_password_description: You use your email and password to login to Agnost cluster.
your_avatar_description: This is your team's avatar. Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files. An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
your_providers_description: You can sign in to Agnost cluster using any of the following providers.
delete_account_description: Permanently remove your organizations and all of their projects and associated environments. This action is not reversible. Please continue with caution.
name_updated_description: Your name has been updated successfully
email_updated_description: We have sent you an email to confirm your new email address
email_updated_success_description: Your email has been successfully updated. You can now use your new email to sign in.
password_reset_email_sent: Password reset email sent successfully, please check your inbox
email_sent_description: An email has been sent to {{email}} with instructions to reset your password
delete_confirm_description: Confirm account delete by typing <confirmCode>{{confirmCode}}</confirmCode> below.
delete_account_alert_title: Are you sure to delete your account?
delete_account_alert_description: All owned organizations, their apps, managed resources and associated data will be deleted. This action is not reversible - please continue with caution.

editor.title: Editor Preferences
editor.tab_size_desc: The number of spaces a tab is equal to
editor.minimap_desc: Controls if a Minimap is shown.
editor.font_ligatures_desc: Configures font ligatures or font features.
